title: Pokedex
description: Shows all Pokemon with the help of the PokeAPI and each Pokemon has a different page that can be reached through clicking on the Pokemon on the home page.

title: The Easy Allies' Hall of Greats
alt: The Easy Allies' Hall of Greats
description: A showcase of Easy Allies's Hall of Greats, which is their Hall fo Fame for video games.
technologies: React, Node.Js, Express, MongoDB, SCSS, React Bootstrap, Material UI

title: Budget Tracker
description: Website to track your expenses in a chart that changes through the expenses and income you put into the application.
technologies: Manifest, Node.Js, Service Worker, and Mongoose

title: Proshop
description: MERN Stack Online Shop with the ability to purchase items and create an account. With various other features.
technologies: React, Redux, Node.Js, Express, Mongoose, MongoDB, React Bootstrap, Cloudinary

title: Snippit
description: Community site that allows web developers to share, search, and respond to code-based questions.
technologies: React, Node.Js, Express, Express-Session, MongoDB, Passport, Bcrypt, Ace Editor

title: Color Blindness Application
description: An easily accessible hearing and sight tests for rural populations in India. Translated into Hindi, Kannada, Telugu, and Tamil languages.
